TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>放置控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>上您[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制項或表單。
主機[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>項目。
> [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration.dll 隨[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]組件。 組件的預設位置是 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。
主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在 Windows Form 中的項目，您必須指派[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A>屬性。
使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A>要指派自訂之間的對應內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>控制項和其裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>控制項主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 3-D WPF 複合控制項在 Windows Form 中裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。
[!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.permission: 呼叫堆疊中較高的所有呼叫端的完全信任。 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

Public Overrides Property AutoSize As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
Docs.value: 如果控制項會調整大小以配合其內容。否則， 。 預設值為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BackColorTransparent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BackColorTransparent : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
Docs.value: 如果裝載的項目有透明背景。否則， 。 預設值為 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A>屬性可讓複製點陣圖，這讓裝載使用透明度透過主機容器的項目。 透過映像或背景漸層停駐項目時，這非常有用。
基於效能考量，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A>預設關閉屬性。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 只有一個項目可以裝載，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A>可以有任意數目的子項目。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A>屬性來指定裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 3-D WPF 複合控制項在 Windows Form 中裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。
[!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。 `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。
`disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

block.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

Docs.param: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
Docs.summary: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A>方法，以將所有轉送鍵盤訊息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]modelessly 開啟視窗。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A>方法安裝中的訊息篩選器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]為基礎的應用程式。 非強制回應視窗是作用中時，篩選會轉送所有鍵盤訊息。

Docs.permission: 呼叫堆疊中較高的所有呼叫端的完全信任。 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnabledChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnabledChanged (e As EventArgs)

Docs.param: The data for the event.
Docs.summary: Raises the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

block.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaintBackground%2A>方法到幕後 HBITMAP 繪製父控制項的背景。 此點陣圖中裝載的項目背景以用於支援透明度。
這個方法支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

Docs.returns: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

Docs.summary: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
Docs.value: A對應至上主控的屬性 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 項目。

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技術有兩個類似但不同屬性的模型。 *屬性對應*支援兩種架構之間的互通性。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A>屬性翻譯<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A>屬性託管的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 使用 ElementHost 控制項的對應屬性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md)。
[!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

Docs.param: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .
to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.
Docs.summary: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>方法會啟動裝載的項目。 如果裝載的多個項目存在，第一個或最後一個元素就會啟動，取決於`directed`和`forward`參數。
重複呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>方法不會周遊託管的項目。 若要選取後續項目，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A>屬性。
此實作會將轉送 索引標籤中的索引鍵[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。
